data.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation - '"Grave Danger" (Part 2)
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Sorta Cinema on Spotify. We're back with the second half of our two-part series covering "Grave Danger"! An episode of 'CSI: Crime Scene Investigation' written and directed by legendary filmmaker Quentin Tarantino. Will the CSI team save their friend Nick from his early grave? Will they solve the mystery of the styrofoam cup? Will they bring enough shovels?!   Find out this week, on Sorta Cinema!   Follow the podcast @SortaCinema on social media! Follow Dalton James @IAmDaltonJames Follow Ryan Chiu @RyanChiu_
